job.title: Senior Data Engineer
job.description:
TITLE:
Senior Data Engineer – ETL/ELT, SQL and Python or Java
LOCATION: This is a remote role.
PAY: Target pay for this role may vary based on experience and location of the candidate.
OVERVIEW
ProFocus is searching for a Senior Data Engineer with proven experience in ETL/ELT, SQL and Python or Java for a remote, direct hire role.
This is an Experienced/Senior level Data Engineer role with great compensation and is responsible for developing a world-class analytics capability to enable efficient collection, aggregation, and delivery of data across a wide range of sources. Please email us your resume so we can discuss.
WHAT YOU WILL BE DOING
Lead the development of optimal data pipeline architecture
Build the infrastructure required for optimal extraction, transformation and loading of data
Build analytics tools that utilize the data pipeline to provide insights into key business performance metrics
WHO WE'RE LOOKING FOR
5-10 years of experience in SW development or analytics with at least 5 dedicated to data engineering
Expert knowledge of ETL/ELT and streaming data tools with broad knowledge of open-source tools
Advanced proficiency in
OOP
(Python preferred)
Expert knowledge of
SQL
and cloud database administration
Have strong verbal and written communication skills
Authorization to work in the US is a precondition of employment. We do not sponsor work visas.
PREFERRED
Bachelor’s degree in
Computer Science, Informatics, Statistics, Information Systems
or demonstrate equivalent experience
Hand on experience with
graph databases
(Neo4j) preferred
Provide a strong portfolio with work samples – GitHub link
Experience authoring automated ML pipelines is strongly preferred
ABOUT OUR CLIENT
Our client is an established company with an exciting new subsidiary. Their mission is led by technologists and scientists using innovative technology for good. Be a part of this global momentum!
WHY ProFocus
Candidates come first.
ProFocus recently earned the Best in Staffing Award for Talent Satisfaction due to our World-Class service to our amazing candidates.
Quality process.
We invest the time to learn about your skills, experience, and career goals in detail so we can find you a position that is a great fit.
Access to hiring managers.
We have close relationships with some of the most respected companies in Portland. Due to those relationships, we can provide direct access to managers and positions that may not be available anywhere else.
Excellent benefits.
We offer medical, dental, vision, 401k, education reimbursement, sick leave, and employer-paid short-term disability and life insurance.
